header.title: Let's build something great together
header.description: Whether your want to start from scratch or add new features to your project, I'm here to help. You can hire me as a solo dev or I can join your team for one or all of the services below.

scoping.title: Zero to one - Scopes & Prototypes
scoping.description: I’ll help you understand your audience, map out user journeys, and outline the structure of your app. From there, we’ll create interactive prototypes that bring your vision to life with a focus on your brand and user experience.

development.title: Hit the ground running - Build a website or app
development.description: Whether you're looking to build an MVP or add new features to an existing app, I specialize in building efficient, scalable solutions with Ruby on Rails. Together, we’ll ensure your app evolves alongside your business goals.

apis.title: Connect & Grow - APIs integrations
apis.description: Let’s expand your app’s capabilities by integrating APIs to enhance functionality. From payment processing to CRMs, I'll seamlessly connect your app to the services you need.

deploy.title: Ready to shine - Tests, deploy & collaboration
deploy.description: With a focus on quality and reliability, I’ll handle testing and deployment to ensure smooth launches. I’m ready to collaborate with your team, maintain code quality, and keep your project moving forward.

boost.title: Conquer the market - Boost & track traffic
boost.description: Let’s bring new users to your app and keep them engaged! Using my experience in Marketing, I’ll help you set up tools to monitor traffic and implement strategies for growth.
